questions: Is there a llama in the image?
Is there a wooden chair in the image?
Is the llama lounging on the chair?
model_output:
yes because a llama is visible in the image.
yes because there is a chair that appears to be made of wood.
no because the llama is not sitting on the chair; it is on the floor.
yes because the llama has a thick, woolly coat which looks fluffy.
yes because the material and structure suggest the chair is wooden.
